descriptionHtml:
Azzak was one of the few heroes Nordiques, who must have the ability to regenerate and invokes a powerful dragon priest, he was an ally of Konahrik: When the level of health is low, the mask can repel enemies, treat injuries and create an aura of flames around the player. There is also a chance that the mask invokes a dragon priest who will help you, Craft category at forging steel, the helmet can be forged by the smith in next vacation
- Riverwood
- Whiterun
- Makarath
- Solitude
- Windhelm
can be disenchanted, and improved the forge,
if you Have Some trouble with the mod, console² command -player.additem Azzak help ² (id) 1 -entry, its all

it's just a simple mode for fun, if you like subscribe, now have fun and for those who ask me for armor, I do not give information, this has nothing to do with my mod, be understanding !

no DLC!
version only for males
your male NPCs can be equipped

thanks to Bethesda for this wonderful game, and all those who like my mods and others.
